fields.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Degree ID.  This is the unique identifier for a Degree.
This is the name of the Degree with more validation for Localized Degrees. Non-blank value allowed.
This is the rating value for the Degree.
This is the description of the Degree.
Indicates if the degree is inactive.  If a degree is inactive, it will no longer be allowed to be selected when a worker adds an education.
Indicates that the degree is restricted by the country / countries

Description.description: This is the description of the Degree.

ID.description: Degree ID.  This is the unique identifier for a Degree.

Inactive.description: Indicates if the degree is inactive.  If a degree is inactive, it will no longer be allowed to be selected when a worker adds an education.

Name.description: This is the name of the Degree with more validation for Localized Degrees. Non-blank value allowed.

Rating_Value.description: This is the rating value for the Degree.

Restricted_to_Countries_Reference.description: Indicates that the degree is restricted by the country / countries
